description: The Enchancement mod completely overhauls how regular enchanting works in Minecraft!

&&6All enchantments that are flat buffs have been removed (with the exception of efficiency). &&rInstead, the enchancement mod adds different uniquely powerful enchantments for your tools, weapons, and armour!
No need to worry about RNG! enchancement allows you to &&6pick the enchant you want &&rthrough the enchantment table, &&rthough only &&6one can be applied per item.&&r

In addition, the &&6cost &&rof enchanting items has been reworked. You can now pay for enchantments using either &&6lapis, experience, or the material that the item is made from. &&rAdding &&6bookshelves &&raround the enchantment table will &&6decrease the cost &&rof applying an enchantment.
Another huge change this mod makes is &&6disabling durability, &&rto make up for the loss of the unbreaking and mending enchantments among other reasons.
If you aren't a fan of this and want to disable it, there is an option within the config that you can open through the "mods" tab in the escape menu.
